newsArray.title: Michigan ranked 14th in preseason AP Top 25 football poll
newsArray.description: For the fourth consecutive year, the Wolverines will enter the college football season ranked in the top 15. Michigan checked in at No. 14 in The Associated Press Top 25 preseason poll released Monday that featured plenty of Big Ten and Southeastern Conference teams, with Texas leading the way.

newsArray.title: Arden Walker Reveals Colorado Buffaloes' Biggest Growth Under Deion Sanders
keywords: colorado buffaloes,boulder,deion sanders,buffaloes,colorado,arden walker,coach prime,missouri tigers,transfer portal,arthur walker,folsom field ,big 12 ,big 12 football ,2025 season,media day
creator: Jack Carlough
newsArray.description: Entering his third season with the Colorado Buffaloes, defensive end Arden Walker has seen great change within the program under coach Deion Sanders. The former Missouri transfer recently shared his perspective on the growth "Coach Prime" has facilitated.

newsArray.title: Tawfiq Byard seizing opportunity with CU Buffs football
creator: Brian Howell
newsArray.description: Boulder is a completely new environment for Tawfiq Byard, who grew up on the East Coast before playing the past two seasons at South Florida, but he saw a golden opportunity in transferring to play for the Colorado Buffaloes.
